author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Government Order has been issued

There will be no interviews hereafter for the recruitment to all the Non-Gazetted Group ‘B’ and ‘C’ posts in the Union Territory of Puducherry.

A government order of the Union Territory of Puducherry stated it had been decided that the Administration would conduct direct recruitment to all the Non-Gazetted Group ‘B’ and ‘C’ posts irrespective of Grade Pay attached to the post without making any reference to the Union Public Service Commission.

PM’s I-Day

announcement

Prime Minister Narendra Modi in his address to the nation on the occasion of Independence Day announced that Government should discontinue holding interviews for recruitment for junior level posts in order to improve objectivity, transparency and to enable level-playing opportunity to candidates from all sections of the society.

Following a notification from the Department of Personnel and Administrative Reforms, Lieutenant Governor of Puducherry, A.K. Singh has ordered discontinuation of interviews in all direct recruitment to the Non-Gazetted Group ‘B’ and ‘C’ posts (including erstwhile Group ‘D’ posts) in this administration.

Applicable to all PSUs

“The recruitment will be made purely on the basis of written test or merit only. This order is also applicable to all Public Sector Undertakings or societies or autonomous bodies or boards under the control of Government of Puducherry,” said S.Sundaravadivelu, Secretary, Department of Personnel and Administrative Reforms, in a recent order.
